backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining types and CRUD logic for clients, tasks, assignees, and user profiles with access control and per-caller storage maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing added assignee-wise sorting and listing associated frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries of all major frontend files including pages, components, hooks, utilities, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens, theming variables, and dark mode mappings.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, favicon, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, authentication flow, profile setup gating, and main application routes.
frontend/src/components/assignees/Assign: Dialog for CSV-based bulk assignee upload with template download, file parsing, validation, and mutation handling.
Dialog for creating, editing, and deleting assignees with validation and CRUD mutations.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal capturing a user's name and saving it via a profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignedOutSc: Public landing screen with branding and a login button using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientBu: Dialog for CSV-based bulk client upload with parsing, validation, and creation flow.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientFo: Dialog for creating, editing, or deleting a single client with validation and form state handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout including navigation, mobile menu, user profile avatar, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskBulkEd: Dialog enabling bulk updates to multiple tasks with optional field changes.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskBulkUp: Dialog for uploading a CSV, validating parsed tasks, and submitting them via bulkCreateTasks.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskDetail: Read‑only task details viewer showing core fields, dates, and financial info using formatted helpers.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskFormDi: Create/edit task form dialog handling full task field input, state initialization, and submission via create/update hooks.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskQuickS: Inline status selector that updates a task’s status using updateTask.
frontend/src/constants/taskStatus.ts: Defines allowed task statuses, legacy mappings, and helpers for normalizing, validating, and displaying statuses.
frontend/src/hooks/assignees.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD and bulk operations on assignees using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/clients.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD and bulk operations on clients using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/tasks.ts: React-query hooks for CRUD and bulk operations on tasks using the backend actor, with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides hooks to fetch and save the caller's user profile through the backend actor with caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a context provider and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and login state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/dataParser.ts: Deprecated helpers for parsing and encoding client data for backward compatibility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AssigneesPage.tsx: UI page for listing, searching, editing, and bulk-deleting assignees with dialogs and table controls.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDetailPage.tsx: Client detail view that loads client data, lists tasks for that client, and provides edit and task creation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsPage.tsx: UI page to list, search, select, upload, and bulk-delete clients using table controls and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing aggregated task metrics, upcoming and overdue tasks, with navigation filters.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Full task management page with filtering, sorting, bulk actions, CSV upload, and task CRUD dialogs.
frontend/src/utils/assigneeCsv.ts: Generates and parses CSV files for assignee bulk upload with validation and backend formatting.
frontend/src/utils/clientCsv.ts: CSV utilities for client bulk upload including parsing, validation, template generation, and formatting.
frontend/src/utils/taskAggregations.ts: Provides functions to compute task statistics, revenue by category, and status breakdowns.
frontend/src/utils/taskCsv.ts: Handles CSV template generation, parsing, and validation for bulk task upload including date and number conversion.
frontend/src/utils/taskDisplay.ts: Utility helpers for formatting task dates, currency, and optional text with a placeholder.
frontend/src/utils/taskExcel.ts: Converts tasks into Excel-friendly rows, loads SheetJS dynamically, and exports a formatted XLSX file.
frontend/src/utils/taskSort.ts: Provides sorting logic for tasks across multiple fields using safe comparison functions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing and state retention.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theming, typography, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app goals, architecture notes, features, and known issues.
